nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overriden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropiate to concatenate
behavior.
nodes.name: BasicToken

nodes.documentation: @dev total number of tokens in existence
nodes.name: totalSupply
transfer
balanceOf
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
nodes.name: renounceOwnership
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: finishMinting
TokenPurchase
setParameters

nodes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
nodes.name: buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
nodes.name: _forwardFunds
